title: U.S. Program Aims to Keep Sensitive Weapons in Ukraine
description: Portable, lethal and high-tech munitions like Stinger and Javelin missiles are a focus of a monitoring program operating from the embassy in Kyiv.
dc:creator: Lara Jakes and John Ismay
media:credit: Lynsey Addario for The New York Times
media:description: An American volunteer teaching Ukrainian soldiers how to use a Javelin at a base outside Zaporizhzhia in South Eastern Ukraine.
